wikipedia_page.main: Cyril Asplan Beldam (15 October 1869 – 7 September 1940) was an English first-class cricketer active 1894–1900 who played for Middlesex. A brother of George Beldam, he was born in Northfleet; died in Marylebone.

response: His brother, Cyril Beldam, and a cousin, Ernest Beldam, also played first-class cricket.

link_mentions.page: A. A. Priestley's XI cricket team in the West Indies in 1896–97

response: Ernest Asplan Beldam (30 June 1879 – 28 November 1958) was an English cricketer. He played 39 first-class matches for Middlesex between 1903 and 1907. His cousins Cyril Beldam and George Beldam were also cricketers.
